article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-125cINE hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: What It Was Like To Photograph One Of History's Most Evil Men

div.p: A Jewish photographer describes photographing Nazi propaganda minister Joseph Goebbels.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-10r9se0 hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: Google Declares End Of YouTube In April Fool's Prank

div.p: In an elaborate ruse, the world's most popular video site announces it's been nothing but a contest site this whole time and says it's going dark for the next decade.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-10f7lv0 hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: This May Be The Most Gruesome Injury In The History Of Televised Sports

div.p: Louisville's Kevin Ware suffered what appears to be a compound fracture of both the tibia and fibula in the first half of the Cardinals' Midwest regional final bout against Duke. The injury led to a ten-minute delay in the action and is one of the most difficult things to watch, ever.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-ZRFuRT hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: Who Puts All Your Favorite TV Shows Online For Free?

div.p: They’re some of the most popular torrents around, but how do they get on the Internet and who puts them there?

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-1246Jsp hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: Drone City USA

div.p: Seemingly everybody’s talking about drones. And arguably no city is paying closer attention to the national debate over these controversial unmanned aerial vehicles (UAV’s) than San Diego, the undisputed Drone Capital of America.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-122B4ve hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: What Does A Tablet Do To Kids' Minds?

div.p: No one has a true scientific understanding of what the future might hold for a generation raised on portable screens.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-14yb2Rb hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: Meteor Strike: The Complete Story Of Russia's Surprise Fireball

div.p: Here's PBS's great NOVA episode on the Russian meteor strike. (Only playable in U.S.)

h2.a: Treasure Hunt Mode In Google Maps

div.p: Spotted on Hacker News. Not sure how old or new this is, but still pretty great.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-10m4lfp hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: What If The Sun Disappeared?

div.p: What would happen if the sun suddenly ceased to exist?

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-Z1SC32 hentry entry story-col-0

header.div: NOBODY WANTS TO STEAL SAMSUNGS THOUGH

h2.a: The iPhone Crime Wave

div.p: What Gotham’s gobbled Apples reveal about the nation’s falling crime rates.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-XPJNKC hentry entry story-col-1

header.div: NOW MOVING ON TO LITERAL CLUES

h2.a: Millionaire Leaving Clues To $2 Million Of Buried Treasure

div.p: For the past three years, amateur treasure hunters from around the nation have been scaling mountains and scouring forests in search of an elusive bounty of gold nuggets, jewels and rare antiquities believed to have been buried by an eccentric New Mexico millionaire.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-10noWi6 hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: The Best Ways To Dry Out A Cell Phone

div.p: Video evidence that we will try pretty much anything to save a wet phone.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-XvjVrs hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: A 'Game Of Thrones' Guide To Tech Companies

div.p: What the biggest tech companies tell us about “Game of Thrones,” what “Game of Thrones” tells us about the biggest tech companies, and what Theon Greyjoy looks like with Marissa Mayer’s hair.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-1231MUC hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: Four-Year-Old Supercomputer That Was Once World's Fastest Will Be Dismantled

div.p: IBM Roadrunner, the first petaflop machine, goes offline today.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-XuNCsK hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: NYT Leads Obit For Brilliant Rocket Scientist With A Nod To Her Cooking And Parenting

div.p: "I find it kind of hard to believe that the Times would start an obituary for a man this way."

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-XuUoi5 hentry entry story-col-0

header.div: SEAN PARKER IS SUCH A JOFFREY

h2.a: Facebook Co-Founder Throwing Medieval Themed Wedding

div.p: Facebook co-founder and billionaire Sean Parker will marry his fiancée, Alexandra Lenas, in June during a medieval-themed costume party.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-14vO4Ka hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: Billionaire Plans Park Of Giant Dinosaurs

div.p: An eccentric Australian mining magnate who is building a replica of the ill-fated Titanic has unveiled his latest scheme -- a park of giant robotic dinosaurs.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-XpHf9Z hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: Unbelievable GIFs Of An Artist Balancing Palm Leaf Ribs

div.p: More than a simple test of stability, Balance presents a visually mesmerizing look at the form that Eugster creates and eventually steadies on his head.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-X6cjKB hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: Meet The 10 Celebrities Google Picked To Try Out Google Glass

div.p: Here are ten celebrities who were picked in Google's #ifihadglass competition.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-XkEckn hentry entry story-col-1

header.div: OHH, THAT'S WHAT JESUS LOOKS LIKE

h2.a: Google Vs. Bing On Easter

div.p: Conservatives' longstanding complaints about Google's choice of "Google doodles" are only going to be reenforced by today's decision to commemorate Easter as the birthday of Latino labor leader Cesar Chavez.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-XLQ7Tn hentry entry story-col-2

header.div: IF FACEBOOK LIVED IN THE SHIRE

h2.a: Here's The 'Very Anonymous' Building Facebook Demanded From A Starchitect

div.p: Frank Gehry’s buildings tend to become tourist attractions and landmarks the instant they open. But the renowned architect’s client Facebook decided it didn’t want a landmark after hiring Gehry to expand the company’s headquarters. Facebook wanted something much blander.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-YKKyHT hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: These Awesome Floating Vases Are Practically Invisible

div.p: These floating vases designed by the Japanese group oodesign take things in the opposite direction by making them look like water ripples.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-10lHFvV hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: The Crazy Story Behind The Most Expensive Deal In Sports

div.p: This is the story of the negotiation that led to a contract with Alex Rodriguez that stands as the largest ever in American sports: $275 million over 10 years.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-123XKaJ hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: Syrian Bomb Makes Perfect Landing

div.p: Here's a short video of Syrian bomb that punched a perfect hole into some concrete.
